ai-anya-e0605n17:2_0: If they want to go on retreat and look after those of Aṅgiyānī,
ai-anya-e0605n17:3_0: in the horns of doubts, uncertainties, and uncertainty,
ai-anya-e0605n17:5_0: one who is not abandoned, one who is not deceitful, one who is deceitful,
ai-anya-e0605n17:8_0: (But) the wicked one who sees wicked deeds,
ai-anya-e0605n17:9_0: falling into the underworld of wicked desires, falling into the lower realms,
ai-anya-e0605n17:12_0: having passed away from the unskillful and wholesome,
